summary: This mod adds a new Standalone Male Healer.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff]Thank you for seeing. 
[/color][img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/3/1/31ec39ea.png[/img]

[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]ABOUT THIS MOD____[/b][/size][/color]

This mod adds a new Standalone Male follower. You can find him [color=#00ffff]Old Hroldan Inn[/color].
His name is Evasio. Please call him "Evan".
He is [color=#ffff00]Tank[/color] and [color=#ffff00]Healer[/color]. His Voice heals You and Your Teammate.
He is [color=#ff00ff]marriageable [/color]and [color=#ff00ff]essential[/color].

[img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/0/3/03584c40.png[/img]

Name: Evasio
Sex: Male
Combat style: Tank and Healer
Level: min 15 to max 100
Perk: Light Foot, Silent Roll, Stealth, Block and Other


[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Credit____[/size][/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?]High Res Face Maps[/url] for Men by Geonox by Geonox
Northborn Scars by Northborn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles[/url] by Chris57 and FavoredSoul

Thanks a lot!!
